## CharityORG.getAscResult() method

Get the result of an ascension without ascending.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getAscResult(memberName: string): CharityVolunteerAscension | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  memberName | string | Name ofcharity volunteer. |

**Returns:**

[CharityVolunteerAscension](./bitburner.charityvolunteerascension.md) \| undefined

Object with info about the ascension results, or undefined if ascension is not possible.

## Remarks

RAM cost: 2 GB

Get a [CharityVolunteerAscension](./bitburner.charityvolunteerascension.md) result for ascending acharity volunteer without performing the ascension.
